summary: This document is an email chain from June 2020 between individuals preparing a grand jury presentation. It includes requests to create slides from Ghislaine Maxwell's 2016 deposition testimony and from flight records. The testimony excerpts show Maxwell denying knowledge of Jeffrey Epstein's scheme to recruit underage girls and denying giving massages.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of deposition testimony excerpts attached to the email. In the testimony, she is questioned about Jeffrey Epstein's activities and denies knowledge of a scheme to recruit underage girls for sexual massages.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to in the deposition testimony excerpts. The questions focus on whether he had a scheme to recruit underage girls and possessed sex toys.

persons.name: Minor Victim-2
persons.context: Mentioned in a deposition question where Maxwell is asked if she ever gave this person a massage, which she denies.

connections.description: Maxwell is questioned about Epstein's activities, indicating a close personal and professional association central to the investigation.
A deposition question implies an alleged interaction between Maxwell and this minor victim, which Maxwell denies.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Deposition Day 1
events.description: First day of Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition testimony, a transcript of which is attached to the email.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Deposition Day 2
events.description: Second day of Ghislaine Maxwell's deposition testimony, a transcript of which is attached to the email.

events.title: Email Planning Grand Jury Presentation
events.description: Email exchange discussing the preparation of slides for a grand jury presentation, including excerpts from Maxwell's deposition and flight records.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell, in her 2016 deposition, testified she was not aware of any scheme by Jeffrey Epstein to recruit underage girls for sexual massages.
Maxwell testified she was not aware of anyone under 18 she interacted with at Epstein's properties, aside from someone who was 'obviously 17'.
Maxwell denied being aware of the presence of sex toys in Epstein's Palm Beach house and denied ever giving anyone, including Epstein and 'Minor Victim-2', a massage.
The email chain shows active preparation for a grand jury presentation in June 2020, involving evidence from Maxwell's depositions and specific flight records from the 1990s.
The flight dates requested for slides (e.g., November 11, 1996; May 9, 1997) suggest these were dates of interest for travel possibly related to the case.
